Bar
Nestled in the heart of the Havana Beach Bar & Grill restaurant, our hand-carved mahogany bar transcends the ordinary, inviting patrons to experience a journey of taste and atmosphere like no other.  It's a place where friends come together, strangers become fast friends, and the artful libations crafted by our skilled mixologists will conjure made-to-order cocktails that ingeniously captivate every sense.  Beyond the exquisite cocktails and carefully curated wine list, the Bar is a true haven for those with a penchant for variety.  With a generous selection of craft beers from crisp lagers to robust stouts, there's a brew to suit every beer lover's palate.  Moreover, the bar boasts an extensive and diverse amount of liquors including the finest bourbons and single malt scotches to top-shelf vodkas, rums, gins and tequilas.
Bar Hours
Daily:
11am - 10pm
Location
63 Main Street
Rosemary Beach, FL 32461
Contact
850-588-2882

Skip to navigation

(opens in a new tab)
Find The Perfect Dining Experience
See How To Make Unforgettable Memories
Embrace the delight of savoring life, relishing great food and drink, through a dining experience that harmoniously fuses the influences of the Gulf Coast, Caribbean and Rosemary Beach, FL. All of this is presented in an inviting, family-oriented setting at The Pearl Hotel that celebrates Ernest Hemingway’s love for El Floridita, his romantic restaurant haunt in Havana, Cuba.
In alignment with the spirit endorsed by Hemingway himself, Havana Beach Bar & Grill delivers an exquisite dining affair within a relaxed environment. Patrons have the chance to immerse themselves in this experience through three distinctive avenues, each deserving of its own dedicated visit: within the
main dining room
(a bustling scene set to live piano entertainment on select nights), as well as outdoor seating on the veranda overlooking Main Street, at our
hand-carved mahogany bar
,  or atop the
Rooftop
(a must-see sunset spot with captivating views of the Gulf and the Rosemary Beach
®
community).
Main Dining Room
Inspired by the vibrant and timeless ambiance of old-town Havana, the dining room features a warm, inviting setting with outdoor Veranda seating.
Main Dining Room
Inspired by the vibrant and timeless ambiance of old-town Havana, the dining room features a warm, inviting setting with outdoor Veranda seating.
Learn More
Havana Beach Rooftop
The Rooftop includes an outdoor bar, community and individual tables, as well as cozy outdoor seating under cabanas.
Learn More
Bar
The Bar boasts a hand-carved mahogany bar, expert mixologists, and an extensive wine list, making it ideal for socializing with friends or pre-dinner relaxation.
Learn More
